title: OS Level 9 — Virtual Memory & Page Replacement
intro: This level covers virtual memory, demand paging and basic page replacement algorithms.
points: Understand the concept of virtual memory and its advantages.
Demand paging: pages are brought into memory only when needed.
Page fault: what it is and when it occurs.
Basic page replacement algorithms: FIFO, Optimal (OPT), LRU.
Belady’s anomaly in FIFO (at concept level).
